strings.GADGET_DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to use the Query API to list music files on your computer
strings.GADGET_COPYRIGHT: Copyright (c) 2006 Google Inc. All Rights Reserved
strings.GADGET_ABOUT: Query API Sample Gadget Copyright (c) 2006 Google Inc. All Rights Reserved This gadget uses the Google Desktop Query API to display some songs (mp3) from different artists on your computer. The Query API uses the Google Desktop indexing capability to quickly search your hard drives for files containing the requested information.
